name: slo-dashboard
description: Business SLO Governance Dashboard presenting real‑time SLI metrics, error budget burn, projected compliance, and self‑healing impact for stakeholders.

personas.goal: Detect emerging error budget breaches early
Validate feature compliance vs. promised SLOs

businessObjectives: Provide single pane of glass for reliability posture
Surface imminent error budget breach risk (next 24h)
Quantify self-healing contribution to regained availability
Enable exportable compliance evidence for audits
Support decisions on feature freeze vs. release continuation
nonFunctionalRequirements: Color indicators have accessible text alternatives
Supports real-time refresh without losing user toggled panels
businessRules: sortedBudgets: sort SLOs by remaining error budget descending
getProgressColor: map compliance percentage to semantic status (green>=99.5, yellow>=98, red<98)
calculateProjection: compute projected end-of-window compliance using current burn rate
burnRate: classify burn rate (normal, elevated, critical) based on consumption/hour
overallCompliance: aggregate weighted compliance across all active SLOs
handleExport: produce signed JSON + CSV artifact with timestamp and hash
togglePanel: persist UI panel visibility across refresh
getHealthStatus: derive qualitative health label from avgScore & trend
serializeDashboardState: snapshot visible metrics, budgets, projection & filters
computeCompliance: recompute compliance after metrics refresh
triggerExportDownload: initiate user download with integrity banner
edgeCases: NoMetrics: show empty state guidance, compliance N/A instead of 0%
PartialData: exclude incomplete SLOs from overallCompliance calculation but flag count
ExportLarge: degrade gracefully when >200 SLOs (stream rows)
ProjectionNegative: handle zero or negative remaining budget gracefully (show breach now)
BurnRateSpike: highlight SLOs whose 1h burn > 2x 24h average

scenarios.title: Initial load shows aggregate compliance & SLO list
scenarios.given: The dashboard is first loaded with valid metrics
scenarios.then: overallCompliance, sortedBudgets (desc remaining), and burnRate classification are displayed

scenarios.title: Error budget sorting prioritizes most at-risk SLOs
scenarios.given: Multiple SLOs with varying remaining error budgets
scenarios.then: Entries appear ordered by remaining percentage descending

scenarios.title: Color coding reflects compliance tiers
scenarios.then: It returns 'green' and an accessible label 'Healthy'

scenarios.title: Projection warns of imminent breach
scenarios.given: Current burn rate predicts remaining budget < threshold in < 24h
scenarios.then: The SLO is flagged with status 'breach-soon' and highlighted

scenarios.title: Overall compliance aggregates weighted scores
scenarios.given: Three SLOs with distinct weights & compliance
scenarios.then: The displayed percentage equals the weighted mean within ±0.1%

scenarios.title: Refresh preserves panel visibility state
scenarios.given: User has toggled the detail panel open
scenarios.then: The detail panel remains open and data updates without full layout reset

scenarios.title: Accessible labels accompany color indicators
scenarios.then: Each badge exposes a text alternative describing status

scenarios.title: Export produces signed CSV & JSON artifacts
scenarios.then: A CSV and JSON containing SLO id, compliance, burnRate, projection hash are prepared for download

scenarios.title: Empty state guidance when no metrics
scenarios.then: An empty state message with retry & docs link is shown instead of 0% compliance

scenarios.title: Partial data excludes incomplete SLOs from aggregate
scenarios.then: Incomplete SLOs are omitted from numerator & denominator and marked 'data-pending'

scenarios.title: Projection handles zero remaining budget
scenarios.then: Status 'breach-now' is shown with immediate remediation recommendation

scenarios.title: High burn rate spike detection
scenarios.then: SLO is tagged 'spike' and visually emphasized

scenarios.title: Self-healing impact reflected in compliance trend
scenarios.then: Status includes 'improving' label and delta metrics
